<span id="analytics"></span>
= Analytics =

Are you interested in statistics and analytics? Democracycraft supports players being able to view their own statistics on our analytics platform.

<div class="figure">

[[File:https://i.imgur.com/5Ly6tAU.png|Analytics]]

</div>
<span id="commands"></span>
== Commands ==

Run <code>/plan register</code> and follow the instructions to set up your very own analytics page!

Keep in mind, you can only view your own analytics!
